section_purpose: This section describes ablation studies conducted to evaluate the impact of various methodological factors on the effectiveness of the proposed IB-Net approach within the logic equivalence checking (LEC) context.
key_points: Experiments were conducted on LEC datasets with specific settings altered to assess influencing factors.
The results of these ablation experiments are presented visually in a figure (Fig. 4).
The study aims to isolate and understand which components of the method contribute to its performance on SAT problems.
dependencies: Understanding of the IB-Net method from Section 3
Knowledge of the LEC context and datasets from Section 4.1
Familiarity with experimental setup from Section 4.2
reproducibility_notes: Reference to the specific LEC datasets used
Details of the 'certain settings' that were changed versus kept constant
The results visualized in Figure 4, which are not described in the text
